message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.CR, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper proposes a method for face anti-spoofing using a user-centered model, which involves generating new spoof images, training a CNN for liveness detection, and evaluating live and spoof testing images for each subject. This method is based on style transfer and spoof image representation models, which are commonly used in computer vision (cs.CV) and multimedia (cs.MM) research. The paper also addresses the challenge of obtaining fraudulent images from all users to train the models, which is a common issue in cybersecurity (cs.CR) research. The proposed method involves training a CNN for liveness detection, which is a common technique in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) research.
